price: Mu by’ukuri abahimba ikinyoma ni ba bandi batemera amagambo ya Allah, kandi abo ni bo banyabinyoma.
arabic: إِنَّمَا يَفۡتَرِي ٱلۡكَذِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡكَٰذِبُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: innamā yaftarī al-kadhiba alladhīna lā yu'minūna biāyāti al-lahi wa-ulāika humu al-kādhibūna
